metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28085 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in htmldoc commit 31f7804. A heap buffer overflow in thefunction pdf_write_names in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to arbitrary code executionand Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
